Relentless Step.name: Relentless Step
Relentless Step.flavor: No enemy can escape from you and your ally. All it takes is for one arrow to find its mark, and you can close in for the kill.
Relentless Step.effect: You teleport yourself and the target to different squares within 5 squares of an enemy within 20 squares of you. You must have hit the enemy with a seeker attack during this turn.
